lead_paragraph: Real Madrid coach Zinedine Zidane urged his side to remain calm after their Champions League hopes suffered a setback with a shock 2-0 loss at VfL Wolfsburg in the first leg of their quarter-final tie on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Zidane Appeals for Calm as Real Stunned by Wolfsburg
headline.main: Zidane Appeals for Calm as Real Stunned by Wolfsburg

snippet: Real Madrid coach Zinedine Zidane urged his side to remain calm after their Champions League hopes suffered a setback with a shock 2-0 loss at VfL Wolfsburg in the first leg of their quarter-final tie on Wednesday....
